overview:
Drue Banta is in Business Development at Adia Digital Art Co., Ltd.

Drue’s work involves furthering the development of Adia’s contribution to the the video game graphics design industry by managing areas of marketing, sales, and account management and connecting one of the most versatile digital art teams in the world to the creative life-blood of the gaming graphics industry through securing pipelines that promote high-end game assets on multiple platforms.
